CustomField.description: Specify discounts in terms of % or Amt to be discounted off the product's price using quantity purchased or term. Set quantity/term ranges in tiers of different discount %. Discount is applied to List Price & resulting total is stored in the Regular Price
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specify discounts in terms of % or Amt to be discounted off the product's price using quantity purchased or term. Set quantity/term ranges in tiers of different discount %. Discount is applied to List Price & resulting total is stored in the Regular Price
CustomField.label: Discount Schedule
